titleStmt.title: Description of British Library, Or 1490: Fragments of Midrash ha-gadol on Numbers.

notesStmt.note: Some folios stuck on modern paper.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Fragments of Midrash ha-gadol on Numbers.

msItem.title: Fragments of Midrash ha-gadol on Numbers.

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; ruled lines: 23; written lines: 23; Catchwords on every verso. Visible mastara ruling. Some marginal notes.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Black buckram, blind-tooled. Spine title: 'Midrash on Numbers. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 1490.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), a antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 24 November 1877: inscribed, folio [102v].
